label: Temporary Body Art
description: Products and services related to temporary body art, including tattoos, henna, and face painting.

subcategories.label: Temporary Tattoos
subcategories.description: Non-permanent tattoos applied to the skin using various methods.

subcategories.label: Henna
subcategories.description: Temporary body art created using henna paste.

subcategories.label: Face Painting
subcategories.description: Temporary designs painted on the face using special paints.
